paper_abstract: We extend a notion of effective continuity due to Mori, Tsujii and Yasugi to real-valued functions on effective topological spaces. Under reasonable assumptions, Type-2 computability of these functions is characterized as sequential computability and the effective continuity. We investigate effective uniform topological spaces with a separating set, and adapt the above result under some assumptions. It is also proved that effective local uniform continuity implies effective continuity under the same assumptions. (C) 2006 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Effective continuities on effective topological spaces
